languages.text: "Вы — слуги Неумирающего, но и слуги Его паствы. Дарители милости".

traits.locale_text: "Ты слуга Неумирающего, но так же и слуга Его паствы. Ты даришь милость и ведешь за собой людей".

languages.text: "You serve the Undying Emperor, yet you also serve His faithful. You are the givers of His Peace."
languages.original_text: "Вы — слуги Неумирающего, но и слуги Его паствы. Дарители милости".

traits.locale_text: "You are servants of the Undying Emperor, yet you are also servants of His faithful. You are the givers of grace."
"You are servants of the Undying Emperor, yet you are also servants of His faithful. You are the givers of grace."
"You serve the Undying Emperor, yet you also serve His faithful. You are the givers of grace."
"You serve the Undying Emperor, yet you also serve His faithful. You are the givers of grace."
"You serve the Undying Emperor, yet you also serve His faithful. You are the givers of His Peace."
"You serve the Undying Emperor, yet you also serve His faithful. You are the givers of His Peace."

languages.text: «Sirven al Emperador Inmortal, pero también sirven a Sus fieles. Son los portadores de Su paz».
languages.original_text: "You serve the Undying Emperor, yet you also serve His faithful. You are the givers of His Peace."

traits.locale_text: «Sirven al Emperador Inmortal, pero también sirven a Sus fieles. Son los portadores de Su paz».

languages.text: 「お前は不死の皇帝に仕えているが、同時に主に忠実な者たちにも仕えている。お前は安寧を与える者なのだな」
languages.original_text: "You serve the Undying Emperor, yet you also serve His faithful. You are the givers of His Peace."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は不死の皇帝に仕えているが、同時に主に忠実な者たちにも仕えている。お前は安寧を与える者なのだな」

languages.text: “你们侍奉不死神皇，但同时也侍奉祂的忠仆。你们是传播神皇恩典之人。”
languages.original_text: "You serve the Undying Emperor, yet you also serve His faithful. You are the givers of His Peace."

traits.locale_text: “你们侍奉不死神皇，但同时也侍奉祂的忠仆。你们是传播神皇恩典之人。”

languages.text: "Ihr dient dem Todlosen Imperator, aber auch seinen Gläubigen. Ihr bringt Seinen Frieden."
languages.original_text: "You serve the Undying Emperor, yet you also serve His faithful. You are the givers of His Peace."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr dient dem Todlosen Imperator, aber auch seinen Gläubigen. Ihr bringt Seinen Frieden."

languages.text: « Vous servez l'Empereur immortel, mais aussi Ses fidèles. En cela, vous êtes pour ainsi dire des passeurs de Sa Paix. »
languages.original_text: "You serve the Undying Emperor, yet you also serve His faithful. You are the givers of His Peace."

traits.locale_text: « Vous servez l'Empereur immortel, mais aussi Ses fidèles. En cela, vous êtes pour ainsi dire des passeurs de Sa Paix. »

languages.text: "Ölmeyen İmparator'a ve O'nun sadık kullarına hizmet edersiniz. O'nun huzurunu tattırırsınız."
languages.original_text: "You serve the Undying Emperor, yet you also serve His faithful. You are the givers of His Peace."
